entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
